edu.uncc.cs.bridges

Class BSTNode<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uncc.cs.bridges.AbstractVertex<T>
      • edu.uncc.cs.bridges.BSTNode<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AbstractVertex<T>>

    public class BSTNode<T>
extends AbstractVertex<T>
    Generic Tree Node class, with visual components. Stores a value, allows for creation of its children.
